alert.note: Alert for Columbus; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Robeson, northwestern Columbus, southeastern Dillon and north central Horry Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake View, or 10 miles northeast of Mullins, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fair Bluff, Lake View, Cherry Grove, Kemper, Evergreen, Cerro Gordo and Marietta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
